name: Garbage Collector
description:
You are a robot that has to collect garbage on the Java heap.

Just roam around and throw away any objects (boxes) that are no longer referenced (have a green 0 on them).  
To help you find those boxes you have a limited amount of time in the InTraciSense mode, which highlights the boxes and gives you slowmotion.

Controls

ActionMouse and KeyboardController*Movement
WASDLeft StickTurn aroundMouse HorizontalRight Stick HorizontalControl ForkliftMouse VerticalRight Stick VerticalAttract and push boxesLeft Mouse ButtonA or Right TriggerInTraciSense ModeHold Right Mouse ButtonHold B or Left Trigger

*: Bindings set up for a Xbox 360 controller using Windows. Will probably not work correct on other platforms.
